Headline: #28 Stony Island Temporary Northbound Reroute near Stony Island/70th
ShortDescription: Northbound 28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted via Stony Island, 73rd, Jeffery, 67th, and Stony Island due to, street blockage near Stony Island/70th

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted via Stony Island, 73rd, Jeffery, 67th, and Stony Island due to, street blockage near Stony Island/70th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier an unauthorized person on the tracks. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier an unauthorized person on the tracks.

 Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
